code:
import JobOffer from"../../images/job-post-4.svg";import JobOfferTitle1 from"../../images/jobOfferTitle1.svg";export default[{headerTitleWithImgTitle:"CAREER OPPORTUNITIES",headerTitleWithImgSubtitle:"eCommerce Marketing Specialist",withHeaderTitleWithImg:true,headerTitleWithImgURL:JobOffer},{title:"The Role in a Nutshell"},{subtitle:"We're looking for an engaging, energetic, experienced and entrepreneurial-minded eCommerce Marketing Specialist to join our team."},{description:[{title:"You will deliver the ultimate digital brand experience by guiding our 
                customers from the critical first touch point to conversion and beyond via our soon to launch digital shop.",containerStyles:{marginBottom:25}},{title:"As an eCommerce Specialist, you will partner closely with the growth team to increase
                 customer traffic and drive transactions at MokenShop by using innovative and brand-propelling marketing 
                 strategies. With the skills you’lll gain in this role, the opportunities are endless – from a rewarding 
                 career in eCommerce Marketing to continued growth and development within Moken.",containerStyles:{marginBottom:25}},{title:"The ideal candidate will be comfortable working with a wide variety of internal and external teams helping to build Moken and its community brands. You’ll aim to drive revenue, penetrate new markets, and connect global communities through content storytelling and work with the growth team to identify new potential products."}]},{title:"Your Day to Day"},{description:[{title:"You’ll be working directly with the Managing Partner of Moken, as well as in some cases a whole group of startup founders and superstars who are next up for changing the world;",withDash:true},{title:"You’ll work in a fast paced environment where no two days are alike;",withDash:true},{title:"Engage our customer throughout the customer journey, with considered Marketing at all
"+"stages;",withDash:true},{title:"You’ll elevate the client experience and position Moken as a world-class retailer online;",withDash:true},{title:"You’ll identify new opportunities and potential products or ideas to integrate into our offerings;",withDash:true},{title:"You’ll ensure an elevated and optimized journey throughout our website;",withDash:true},{title:"You’llbBuild and lead the execution of Moken’s eCommerce initiatives to support the
company's overall online sales, brand and customer experience goals;",withDash:true},{title:"You’ll drive exceptional conversion metrics through all digital touch points while
ensuring brand experience is consistent on our website(s);",withDash:true},{title:"You will be the liaison overseeing any partners managing all 3rd party marketplaces
like Amazon or our internal digital platforms, relaying our brand standards and
reporting on revenue from these platforms;",withDash:true},{title:"You’ll expertly merchandise our online presence through the analysis of customer
"+"behavior and inventory management;",withDash:true},{title:"You’ll strategically plan, execute and monitor 1 to 1 digital channel content via email,
"+"SMS, and other mediums;",withDash:true},{title:"You will work closely with product and design teams to develop direct-to-consumer
"+"product exclusives while also using analytics to help guide future product development;",withDash:true},{title:"You’ll drive strategy, planning and execution of key acquisition/retargeting channels (email, paid acquisition, SEO/SEM, etc.), to drive engagement and conversion, while tracking against key metrics;",withDash:true},{title:"You will analyze site metrics and synthesize digital campaign performance across marketing channels leveraging that information to help lead our customer engagement strategy;",withDash:true},{title:"You will lead site experience improvements through analytics, A/B testing and UI/UX research to drive increased conversion and AOV, while also providing a strong user experience that drives satisfaction;",withDash:true},{title:"You’ll oversee third party vendors and work with partners on strategic initiatives that will improve site KPIs including product reviews and test/targeting;",withDash:true},{title:"You’ll support the preparation of the annual budget, monthly and quarterly forecasts, and monitor reports on results versus budget/forecast based on historical data and analytics.",withDash:true}]},{title:"Your Personality"},{description:[{title:"You are hardworking and motivated by the prospect of creating something impactful",withDash:true},{title:"You enjoy independent work, but also thrive in a team environment",withDash:true},{title:"You’re passionate about creating something new and strive for success in all that you
"+"do",withDash:true},{title:"You communicate effectively and voice your opinions when you truly believe in
"+"something, but are always looking and listening to alternative opinions, methods, and
"+"suggestions from those around you",withDash:true},{title:"You’re confident in yourself but not afraid to ask questions or for help when
"+"necessary",withDash:true},{title:"You’re not afraid to try new things and never shy away from the unknown",withDash:true},{title:"You’re up for a challenge and are willing to learn as you go",withDash:true},{title:"You know you might not know everything, but you’re determined to figure it out along
"+"the way",withDash:true},{title:"Your attention to detail is an area of strength in which you pride yourself on",withDash:true},{title:"You’re a people person and know how to navigate your way through a conversation,
"+"even if it may be completely out of your comfort zone",withDash:true},{title:"You have no problem picking up the phone, or other method of communication and
"+"reaching out to whomever is needed to get the job done",withDash:true},{title:"You have a strong interest in the entrepreneurship and startup industries",withDash:true},{title:"You understand that not everyone always has an answer for you, but you’re okay
"+"figuring it out as you go
",withDash:true},{title:"You’re driven by creating something that you can be proud of",withDash:true},{title:"You’re focused and heavily value achieving success as a team",withDash:true}]},{title:"The Skills You Have"},{description:[{title:"You should be well versed in the basics of marketing;",withDash:true},{title:"You know how to plan and have the ability to manage time;
",withDash:true},{title:"You’re creative and have good presentation skills;",withDash:true},{title:"You have knowledge in the key areas of marketing (such as SEO, social media, content marketing, email marketing, PPC and SEM);",withDash:true},{title:"You know how to plan, create and implement a marketing strategy;",withDash:true},{title:"You understand the key measurement tools available;",withDash:true},{title:"You’re an expert at developing social presence and advocating brands effectively;",withDash:true},{title:"You make it a mission to stay current in marketing trends and news e.g. Google
"+"updates and changes in algorithms;",withDash:true},{title:"You have experience - or you’re excited to try - community driven marketing such as
"+"referral programs, affiliate marketing, ambassador programs, and partnerships;",withDash:true},{title:"You have a commitment to learn and apply Moken’s Community Leadership
"+"principles;",withDash:true},{title:"You have the ability to take on new opportunities and challenges, with a passion to
"+"continue to develop and grow oneself;",withDash:true},{title:"You boast a dedication to operational efficiency, investing in process and systems to
"+"improve team and business results;
",withDash:true},{title:"You have the intellectual and emotional intelligence to tactically partner
"+"cross-functionally in the pursuit of shared business outcomes;",withDash:true},{title:"You have the skills to set clear objectives and hold oneself accountable to reach your
"+"full capability and maximize your capacity;",withDash:true},{title:"You have the skills and/or education that are an asset to perform in the role and the
"+"appetite to continuously learn and develop oneself;",withDash:true},{title:"You’ve got a commitment to quality and investing in results that add value and drive
"+"the business;",withDash:true},{title:"You exude the sense of urgency executing job responsibilities, prioritizing urgent and
"+"important work;",withDash:true},{title:"You have or are actively developing the ability to identify, evaluate, and suggest
"+"business opportunities for today and tomorrow, considering top line and bottom line impacts",withDash:true}]},{title:"Opportunities & Added Value"},{description:[{title:"In this role, you will gain the opportunity to establish long term relationships with growing companies globally while shaping the future of Moken and startups throughout Canada."},{title:"This role is designed to be a unique ownership driven role on the side of Moken, while providing additional contract opportunities for our client’s projects which require your specific skill set. In addition, you will be privy to potential incentives such as profit sharing & ownership opportunities in new projects and ventures.
"}]},{withTitleContainerWithImg:true,titleContainerWithImgTitle:"TO APPLY",titleContainerWithImgDescription:[{title:"For this position, although experience is key, it does not necessarily need to be in this exact role previously. Therefore, we encourage all those who believe they have what it takes to be successful and are up for the challenge to apply."},{title:"ONLY APPLICATIONS SUBMITTED THROUGH THE FOLLOWING METHOD WILL BE REVIEWED AND CONSIDERED"},{title:"To submit an application, please email careers@mokenstartups.com with the subject line “​Pickle, Pickle, Cucumber? ​” with your resume, an introductory 30-second video, cover letter, and some of your most innovative growth tactics."}],titleContainerWithImgImageURL:JobOfferTitle1},{colorBlock:'black',colorSubtitle:'SEE OPPORTUNITIES',colorTitle:'Not the right position? Check out our other opportunities.',colorBlockProps:{containerStyles:{marginBottom:114}}},{withForm:true}];
